data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Ural Yekaterinburg with the kick-off.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow attack but Baktiyor Zaynutdinov's header doesn't find the target.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
CSKA Moscow's Baktiyor Zaynutdinov is on target but unsuccessful.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Baktiyor Zaynutdinov (CSKA Moscow) has received a yellow card from Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 6, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 8, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
CSKA Moscow's Ivan Oblyakov is whistled for offside at VEB Arena.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 12, Goal! CSKA Moscow take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Ilia Shkurin.
That's a fine assist from Baktiyor Zaynutdinov.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Andrey Egorychev (Ural Yekaterinburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In the minute 18, CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Nikola Vlasic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
At VEB Arena, Igor Kalinin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 25, CSKA Moscow are caught offside.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 27, Free kick in a good position for CSKA Moscow!
CSKA Moscow push forward at VEB Arena and Ivan Oblyakov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ural Yekaterinburg defence.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 29, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Denys Kulakov of Ural Yekaterinburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 31, Goal! Ural Yekaterinburg go level at 1-1 through Andrey Egorychev in Moscow.
Great play from Branko Jovicic to set up the goal.
CSKA Moscow's Chidera Ejuke gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Ural Yekaterinburg are coming forward and Dmitri Efremov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Ural Yekaterinburg defence as Baktiyor Zaynutdinov fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 38, Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
CSKA Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
In the minute 41, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Moscow.
Mario Fernandes for CSKA Moscow is whistled offside.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 43, CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Ivan Oblyakov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at VEB Arena.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
The first half has been concluded at VEB Arena.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows to start the second-half. CSKA Moscow with the kick-off.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 47, Pogrebnyak Pavel is booked for the away team.
Pogrebnyak Pavel in Ural Yekaterinburg has been yellow-carded a second time by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi and is being sent off.
In the minute 50, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Dmitri Efremov misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 55, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
CSKA Moscow's Ilia Shkurin gets in a shot on goal at VEB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, CSKA Moscow have been given a penalty...
It's advantage CSKA Moscow in Moscow as Nikola Vlasic scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Fedor Chalov replacing Baktiyor Zaynutdinov.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 68, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at VEB Arena.
In the minute 71, Nikola Vlasic of CSKA Moscow is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
CSKA Moscow are whistled for offside.
In the minute 72, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Nikola Vlasic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 73, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 76, Fedor Chalov (CSKA Moscow) strikes at VEB Arena but his header is cleared.
Mario Fernandes (CSKA Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Fedor Chalov (CSKA Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 78, Alan Dzagoev (CSKA Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Ural Yekaterinburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's second substitution at VEB Arena with Kristijan Bistrovic replacing Alan Dzagoev.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Chidera Ejuke with Nayair Tiknizyan. This is the third substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
In Moscow, Othman El Kabir of Ural Yekaterinburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 83, Aleksey Evseev is replacing Dmitri Efremov for Ural Yekaterinburg at VEB Arena.
In the minute 85, CSKA Moscow's Mario Fernandes breaks free at VEB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
CSKA Moscow push upfield but Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 86, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a second substitution, with Artem Shabolin replacing Andrey Egorychev.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 88, CSKA Moscow's Kristijan Bistrovic has been booked in Moscow.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Igor Kalinin (Ural Yekaterinburg) levels the match at 2-2 with a header.
Denys Kulakov instrumental with a fine assist.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
The match has come to a close in Moscow. The final score is 2-2.
Ivan Oblyakov (CSKA Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ilia Shkurin CSKA Moscow.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Aleksey Evseev, who is grimacing with pain.
Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) has taken off Aleksey Evseev who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Evgeniy Tatarinov is the replacement.
